import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; export default function CartScreen(props) { const {state}=props.history.location.state const id =props.history.location.state.id const qty =props.history.location.state.qty let product = { "name": " ", "category": " ", "image": " ", "countInStock": 0, "price": 0, "brand": " ", "rating": 0, "nreviews": 0, "description": " " }; product= axios.get(`/product/${id}`).then((res)=>{ product=res.data; console.log(product) }) return ( < div > < h1 > cart screen < /h1>

ADD TO CART: PRODUCT ID: { id }, Qty: { qty } < /p> < div className = "row top" > < div className = "col-2" > < h1 > Shopping Cart < /h1>

  • < div className = "row" > < img src = { product.image } className = "small" / > < div > < div className = "min-30" > < Link to = "" > { product.name } < /Link> < / div > < / div > < div className = "row" > < div > { qty } < /div>
    < select > {[...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => (< option key = { x + 1 } value = { x + 1 } > { x + 1 } < /option> )) } < /select > < /div > < /div > < div className = "row" > { product.price } $ < /div> < div > < button onClick = "" > delete < /button>< /div > < /div > < /li > < li > < h2 > Subtotal < /h2> < / li > < button type = "button" onClick = "" className = "primary block" > < Link to = '/shipping' > order < /Link>< / button > < / ul > < / div > < /div> < /div> ); }
